bug.title: [BUG] Xposed框架已安装但未激活
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 在第一次安装成功后，后续个人测试直接在Magisk 停用了模块。在次安装的时候就出现已安装但未激活 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed ![6DFF141FCBFAC171D3E276E8829892C7](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34201576/92321814-a7714880-f05f-11ea-8351-b65eaf99a44b.jpg) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![FED260947FF63A4FA058B553C3138E3D](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34201576/92321835-c8d23480-f05f-11ea-8bde-a77a1862a571.jpg) ![12D5B600AD837F49667C1D4D58984DB5](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34201576/92321840-cd96e880-f05f-11ea-997c-7990e663e3fe.jpg) 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module --------- beginning of head EdXposed Log Powered by Log Catcher QQ support group: 855219808 Telegram support group: @Code_Of_MeowCat Telegram channel: @EdXposed --------- beginning of information Manufacturer: Xiaomi Brand: Xiaomi Device: gemini Product: gemini Model: MI 5 Fingerprint: Xiaomi/gemini/gemini:8.0.0/OPR1.170623.032/8.11.22:user/release-keys ROM description: gemini-user 8.0.0 OPR1.170623.032 8.11.22 release-keys Architecture: arm64-v8a Android build: OPR1.170623.032 Android version: 8.0.0 Android sdk: 26 EdXposed version: v0.4.6.2 (4529) (YAHFA) EdXposed api: 91.0 Riru version: v21.3 (36) Riru api: 7 Magisk: 20.4 (20400) --------- beginning of main --------- beginning of system 09-06 16:27:23.400 1035 1035 I EdXposed-Bridge: Loading modules from /data/app/just.trust.me-A8xyV7Q4ocLN7NdxA09Lgw==/base.apk 09-06 16:27:23.425 1035 1035 I EdXposed-Bridge: Loading class just.trust.me.Main 09-06 16:27:42.067 1036 1036 I EdXposed-Bridge: Loading modules from /data/app/just.trust.me-A8xyV7Q4ocLN7NdxA09Lgw==/base.apk 09-06 16:27:42.129 1036 1036 I EdXposed-Bridge: Loading class just.trust.me.Main

bug.title: [BUG] 刷入EdXp后无限重启
bug.body: **什么情况** 刷入EdXp后无限重启 **Xposed模块列表** 无 **Magisk模块列表** - Riru - Core **EdXposed及Riru版本** EdXposed: 0.4.6.4 YAHFA Riru: 21.3 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [log.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/5052457/log.txt) --- 设备：华为 荣耀8 FRD-AL10 ROM：OpenKirin LineageOS 16.0 Build 4 (底包：FRD-AL10 8.0.0.540(C00)) 尝试过使用Manager里的版本以及目前最新的CI构建（均包括Y版和S版），都有相同问题。

bug.title: [BUG] 小米10有一定概率卡第二屏miui logo
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 有一定概率启动到进入桌面前最后一个miui logo卡住，只能长按电源键强行重启再次碰运气 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56048681/88849741-e6201180-d21c-11ea-82b1-3236a9c4afe9.png) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56048681/88849833-0a7bee00-d21d-11ea-96c4-fc40992acb25.png) magisk通道是stable

bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Stuck on boot. what I did: Install Magisk and root. Install riru-core and reboot. Install edxp and reboot. bug.title: [BUG] Framework installed, but not active | modules.list was not found
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** After installing EdXposed via Magisk, EdXposed manager reports "Framework is installed, but not active". EdXposed-Bridge can't load modules because modules.list is not found. I tried the Magisk version v0.4.6.1 and the latest GitHub release v0.4.6.2. Same error. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** Reported Modules List inside EdXposed manager: - EdXposed Manager v4.5.7 - Lucky-Patchet v8.8.6 - WA Tweaker v1.5.6 All disabled. **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** - CloudflareDNS4Magisk v2.7 - Riru (Riru - Core) v21.3 - Riru - EdXposed v0.4.6.2 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.6.2 (4529) (SandHook) Riru: v21.3 (36) **相关Logcat/Logcat** EdXposed Verbose logs: ``` --------- beginning of head EdXposed Log Powered by Log Catcher QQ support group: 855219808 Telegram support group: @Code_Of_MeowCat Telegram channel: @EdXposed --------- beginning of information Manufacturer: Xiaomi Brand: xiaomi Device: tulip Product: tulip Model: Redmi Note 6 Pro Fingerprint: bug.title: [BUG] #477 Fix causes issues on Huawei Devices
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** I am using a Huawei Mate 9 on LineageOS 16.0 Build 4. When updating to EdXposed v0.4.6.2 starting with commit [32e1565fa5469002b846518b5d7df44b349cbf21](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/32e1565fa5469002b846518b5d7df44b349cbf21) the phone reboots on every attempt to boot. If I pull the most recent master and uncomment the check_persist checks and the subsequent removal of the sepolicy it boots without issue. That reverts [#477 ](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/issues/477). I could submit a pull request to fix this, but I'm not sure what the preferred behavior is. Should there be a check for HUAWEI devices that run this check or should it just skip if SAMSUNG is detected? I'm leaning towards the latter since this check was commented out instead of removed. It seems to have just been a quick fix. The only other question this raises is what other devices need the check. 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** None. 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Busybox Riru Core EdXposed Systemless Hosts 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.6.2 starting with commit [32e1565fa5469002b846518b5d7df44b349cbf21](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/32e1565fa5469002b846518b5d7df44b349cbf21) Riru: v21.3 **相关Logcat/Logcat** https://defuse.ca/b/IAYuSOYhVlgqKOxzcJrcZ0 I had to just use the adb logcat, because I couldn't get it load any modules before it would reboot. 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [Bug] xposed modules.list was not found (again)
bug.body: What happened?** xposed modules.list was not found by EdXposed Manager. I see the file when browsing with Root Explorer. **Xposed/Xposed Module List** GravityBox Beta 7 Screenshot below **Magisk/Magisk Module List** Magisk 20.4 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: .4.6.2 YAHFA Riru: 21.3 **相关Logcat/Logcat** **[all new.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/4897718/all.new.log)** ![Screenshot_20200709-105106](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68071051/87057696-320b0800-c1d5-11ea-9868-1918eb736df3.png) ![Screenshot_20200709-105049](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68071051/87057706-359e8f00-c1d5-11ea-80d1-b7ea5b5e5999.png) 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module RiRu Core = 21.3 Riru - EdXposed = .4.6.2 YAHFA Magisk = 20.4 EdXposed Manager = 4.5.7 I tried forcing SELinux to Permissive. I also tried these settings in xposed manager which worked for someone in the EdXposed XDA thread. ☑ app list mode ☑ instant module list ☑ force hook modules ☑ pass safetynet ![Screenshot_20200709-094850](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68071051/87066928-579e0e80-c1e1-11ea-9b0f-13393c317519.png) Any suggestions?

bug.title: [BUG] System crashes (reboots) after updating module
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Whenever I update my module (instant in module mode), the system crashes and reboots. It's quite annoying when I am debugging my module. Sometimes my phone even bumped into a boot loop. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![xposed](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5022927/84294770-3adbd000-ab7c-11ea-9f5d-045c6b943af4.jpg) bug.title: [BUG] OnePlus 7 Pro get lag.
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** In some apps, after last update (OOS, Europe version), scrolling make the phone to get lag. (Especially in Gallery and Facebook) I disabled the module from Magisk and, after reboot l, all worked fine. I've tried with both versions (YAFHA and SandHook) and was the same thing... still got lag. 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** AdBlocker Reborn Greenify Xposed Pokémon 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 7/P/T Aux Cam Sepolicy Fix App Systemizer Audio Modification Library OPFPControll Module Overlay Mount Fix RENOVATE ICE Riru Core Riru EdXposed (SandHook) substratum lite Overlay Helper VIPER4AndroidFX YouTube Vanced 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:0.4.6.2 (4529 SandHook) Riru:21.2 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: Update
bug.body: Please up to date your xposedframework its too long past

bug.title: [BUG] EdXposed NOT installed error after enabling App List Mode
bug.body: --- name: Bug report, EdXposed not installed error about: EdXposed manager showing edxposed not installed error when App List Mode is on title: "EdXposed manager showing edxposed not installed error when App List Mode is on" labels: bug, edxposed manager, app list mode assignees: '' --- **什么情况/What happened?** 如无法开机/模块无效等 After turning on App List mode in EdXposed manager and reboot, EdXposed manager shows an edxposed not installed error and all the edxposed modules stop working. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** WA Tweaker Instaprefs EdXposed manager Lucky Patcher **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ANXCamera Audio Compatibility Patch Audio Modification library Busybox Log Catcher MagiskHide props config Quickswitch Riru core Riru- EdXposed Universal GMS Doze ViPER4Android **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: EdXposed Canary v4.6.3 (4552) Riru: v21.2 **相关Logcat/Logcat** Here is the link for logcat : https://jpst.it/2bxFy

bug.title: [WARNING] Edxposed dont install over build 4548
bug.body: Guys dont install version of edxposed above than v5.0.0.0 4548 Build 4548 last commited was solosu is final working build Someone has messed up the commit putting rm -rf data partition in above these builds I request @MlgmXyysd to push 4548 build to final but out of canary Because v4529 build causes bootloop on samsung devices stock rom I am attaching solosu commit here in case someone is in need http://www.mediafire.com/file/crzlsmojn1vicoz/EdXposed-SandHook-v0.5.0.0_%284548%29.zip

bug.title: [SUGGEST] Stop pushing unreviewed builds to end user
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Unreviewed pull requests are available to end user. This shouldn't happen anyway. Normal user shouldn't be able to access unreviewed pull requests' artifacts easily. Or to make certain that users who chooses `Canary` channel knows what they are doing clearly.

bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?**: CAN'T PASS SAFETY NET CHECK 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List**: - 3C All-in-One Toolbox - Card Emulator Pro - Device ID Masker Lite - EdXposed Manager - GravityBox [Q] - Lucky Patcher - MinMinGuard - Phone Number Fix 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** - Busybox for Android NDK - L Speed @LSpeedDiscussion - OxyMod - Riru (Riru-Core) - Riru - EdXosed (YAHFA) - Samli Patcher - Systemless Hosts - YouTube Vanced 允许截图/Screenshot allowed ![Screenshot_20200404-192652](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33606175/78454858-bd8f6d00-76ab-11ea-96ca-d4db103e72bd.jpg) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.6.1 (4510) (YAHFA) Riru: Riru-Core v19.7 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module Can't find any logcat module on the website. logs in EdXposed shows cannot read log: EACCES (Permission denied) although I granted storage & superuser permissions

bug.title: [Info] Updating module require double reboot
bug.body: **What happened?** I'm developing a test app for Xposed/EdXposed, every test apk is signed and compiled for release. Every time I upgrade the app, on first reboot the app/module is not working but is enabled on EdXposed Manager, so I need disable the module, reboot and enable the module and reboot. For each upgrade I need to do 3 reboot but I can reduce to 2. Is it normal? **Xposed Module List** Only my test module **Magisk/Magisk Module List** Riru Core EdXposed YAHFA **Versions of EdXposed and Riru** Magisk: 20.3 Riru Core: 19.7 Riru EdXposed: 0.4.6.1 YAHFA

bug.title: [BUG] SafetyNet fails after a few hours after boot
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** SafetyNet fails after a few hours after the phone boots. Only a restart helps, and then it happens again in a few hours. Without EdXposed, it passes just without problems. Android 10, latest EdXposed v0.4.6.1.410 Yahfa, Evolution X ROM. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** GravityBox, Jasi Patcher, Lucky Patcher, XPrivacy Lua, DisableFlagSecure, App Locale 2 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** BusyBox for Android NDK, Google Product Sans, GPay SQLite Fix, Magisk Hide Props Config, Riru - core, Riru - EdXposed, SQLite, substratum, Systemless Hosts, YouTube Vanced. **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.6.1.410 Yahfa Riru: 19.7 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] 0.4.6.1 / LOS 17.1 Unable to Boot
bug.body: ### **What happened?** Samsung S8 (herolte) does not boot past "[Powered by Android](https://www.androidcentral.com/sites/androidcentral.com/files/styles/w830_wm_brw/public/article_images/2017/05/galaxy-s8-boot-screen.jpg)" splash. LineageOS 17.1 / Android Q. Both Sandhook and YAHFA do not boot. Maybe related to #464 as SELinux is stuck as permissive. Seems to work on LOS 17.1 GSIs. Tested with both Magisk 20.3 and your custom-built Magisk, but no dice. ### **Xposed Module List** None ### **Magisk Module List** - Riru Core - EdXposed Sandhook / YAHFA ### **Versions of EdXposed and Riru** - Riru v19.7 - EdXposed v0.4.6.1 ### **Logcat** ~~Not available. ADB logcat returns `waiting for device` indefinitely.~~ ADB logcat is very inconsistent. Will try to output. ### It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module Unable to install EdXposed Modules.

bug.title: Android 7.1.1 support
bug.body: Please add support to Android devices on 7.1.1 and below. There are certain situations, like currently with the Note 8 or Nexus 6p, that even though the phone can be rooted it cannot run original xposed for whatever reason. Likewise, with the Note 8 atleast, you cannot run Magisk or Xposed at all. In these situations, native apks would be great. The Note 4 has a similar issue, as edxposed won't support 6.0.1. even though the majority of the touchwiz roms for it are based off 6.0.1.

bug.title: [BUG] 一个软件启动时不会调用handleLoadPackage
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** [此软件](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1NA_7TW24GII7qpK8na9yLzBq6zotQ5C8) 在启动时不会调用已启用插件的handleLoadPackage方法 尽管如此，它启动时会调用到handleInitPackageResources方法，但这并不能为hook此软件带来帮助 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 一个简单的在handleLoadesourcesPackage和handleInitPackageR时输出包名的xposed模块 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![Magisk模块列表](https://s2.ax1x.com/2020/03/09/8S86qx.jpg) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.6.1 (4510) (YAHFA) Riru: v19.7 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 和上面描述的一样，我的插件分别注册了一个handleInitPackageResources和handleLoadPackage的hook类，并分别在被调用时输出包名到日志。但该软件启动时只有handleInitPackageResources被调用。其他软件启动时都会正常调用handleInitPackageResources和handleLoadPackage

bug.title: [BUG] EdXposed Sandhook causes Bootloop
bug.body: SM-G960F Latest Magisk, Magisk Manager and TWRP. EdXposed 4.1.6 and EdXposed manager 4.5.4 EdXposed caused boot to odin mode about a month ago. Now I reflashed Stock rom, flashed TWRP, reinstalled devbase. Tried EdXposed again today. First EdXposedManager did not recognize the framework but Magisk said Core and EdXposed were active. I tried reinstalling Magisk which lead to boot loop. I updated DevBase Custom rom which fixed boot loop. Then I reinstalled Riru Core and EdXposed and got back to download mode/odin on reboot. So I disabled EdXposed Magisk Module from Recovery and then I could boot back into Android. Magisk/SU work fine. Reenabling EdXposed Module leads to certain boot to download mode/odin. Are there any troubleshooting steps I should try to narrow down the issue?

bug.title: [BUG] how can I block an app (damonps2) from detecting edxposed?
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** an app, damonps2 detect Edxposed module. I dont know enough information of Edxposed (Im newbie on root phone), so I confusing if edxposed has invisibility or not.. so If 'use edxposed= app sure can detect edxposed and we cannot block detecting' , than please tell me edxposed cannot hide itself. +my english is bad, sorry It seems like damonps2 can detect Edxposed module, not edxposedmanager app when installed magisk only (not use magiskhide) → not detect install magisk and 'edxposed manager app' → not detect install magisk & 'edxposed' and 'manager app' → damonps2 detect something and ask delete. I tried to use 'magiskhide' function, but nothing happen. I tried to enable 'App List mode' and 'White List mode' in edxposed manager (and reboot) but damon still detect. (I deleted Damonps2's appdata because damon will not opened if detects something once.) **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** nothing installed yet. **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** AinurJamesDSP, ViPER4Android, AudioModificationLibrary, SystemlessHosts UniversaGMSDoze, YoutubeVanced, RiruCore and Edxposed YAHFA All of those was not detected by damonps2, execept edxposed. I confirmed 'intstall Edxposed yafha → detect' . **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.4.6.1 YAFHA, 0.4.6.1 SandHook and 0.4.6.5 YAFHA that 3 I used to test Riru: 19.7 **相关Logcat/Logcat**

bug.title: [BUG] Battery drain of launcher
bug.body: **What happened?** I have a LG G5 with Android 8.0 stock image. I tested many beta versions of edxposed and I have always returned to xposed 90 beta 3 for 2 issue: lags and battery drain of launcher. Now with the first release 0.4.6.1 lags are disappered, it's very great release, I love it but the battery drain of launcher remain. I tested both versions YAHFA and SandHook but the launcher continue to drain the battery only for the version YAHFA, I tested more one launcher, for example with Nova Launcher the drain is a little minor but it's always high: 50% of battery with 50 minutes of screen on. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** I have only one module enabled on edxposed and is developed by me, it's apply a patch on one apk. The same module enabled on xposed 90 beta 3 and SandHook, not drain the battery. The patch is not applied on launcher, but is the launcher which drain the battery. **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru Core and EdXposed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.4.6.1 Riru: 19.7

bug.title: [BUG] 0.4.6.1版本导致系统设置的分割线变粗变重
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 如题，暂未发现功能实质性影响，仅造成不美观。 已返回0.4.5.0版本，恢复正常，同样问题的朋友可以尝试回退。 如果有相同问题的朋友，看到不妨附上截图/log供作者修复用。 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** Riru v19.5 EdXposed v0.4.6.1-YAHAFA

bug.title: [BUG] 官方Magisk转定制版，系统被锁死
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 小米MIX2S最新开发版，刷官方Magisk20.3无法使用，刷定制版20.1覆盖，Data被锁死，锁屏密码被更改，无法进入系统，刷官方Magisk20.1卸载包（没找到定制版的卸载包），手机变砖 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 无关 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 无关 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:YAHFA-0.4.6.0 Magisk:定制版20.1 Riru:19.6 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 砖了，啥都没了，官方没线刷包，刷降级包三清了，数据全没了 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] EdXposed Framework is Installed, but not active
bug.body: **What happened?** I upgraded Magisk to version 20.3 on my Xperia XZ1 Compact (Android 9, Security Patch 1. September 2019), and now it shows only the Message "EdXposed Framework is installed, but not active. Please check the logs for details" So main functionality is for my device broken. I updated to EdXpsoed Canary YAHFA V0.4.6.1 (4497) but it didn't helped. Before I updated EdXposed, I used the last Alpha v0.4.5.1. In the Verbose Logs is the following message to find, which I think is the error: "java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'java.lang.Class java.lang.Object.getClass()' on a null object reference" **Xposed/Xposed Module List** Gravitybox [P] V.9.1.3 Lucky-P@tcher 8.6.3 XInternalSD V4.8 YouTube Deading, Lockscreen play V2.0.9 **Magisk/Magisk Module List** Busybox for Android NDK V1.31.1 ExSDCard Access Enabler V3.5 FDE.AI V7.2 LKT V1.9.4 Magisk Manager for Recovery Mode (mm) V2019.4.4 Riru - Core V.19.6 Riru - EdXpsoed V0.4.6.1 (4497)-selhygwy (YAHFA) Swift Installer Module V5 YouTube Vanced - Magisk Repo V14.21.54(b01.40.20) **EdXposed Riru /Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: Riru - EdXpsoed V0.4.6.1 (4497)-selhygwy (YAHFA) Riru: Riru - Core V.19.6 **Logcat/Logcat** Verbose Logs are attached. Modules Logs has most same text, but not other text. [all.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/4087751/all.log)

bug.body: My pixel 4 xl brushed magisk-EdXposed-SandHook-v0.4.6.0_beta.4471.-release.zip can be started normally. After deleting it, re-brushing magisk-EdXposed-SandHook-v0.4.5.1_beta will not work. How to solve this problem when loading a page on google?

bug.title: [BUG] Unfortunately installed 0.4.6.0.
bug.body: **What happened?** EdXposed Manager offered to update the Xposed Framework to 0.4.6.0 from 0.4.5.1 through Magisk Manager. No mention of needing a custom Magisk install there so I'm now stuck. My device (marlin - Pixel XL running LineageOS version 16.0-20191029-NIGHTLY-marlin) keeps crashing during the boot, and for some reason it isn't a critical crash so it gets stuck on the boot animation for LineageOS and never actually boots into the system, nor reboot at all unless I press and hold the power button. I did an "adb logcat > logcat.txt" for a little while and posted the results below to show. I can boot into the bootloader, but I've attempted several times to boot into the latest twrp.img or to run the flash-all file from the factory image, and in either case, fastboot freezes if it gets asked anything besides --help or devices, meaning I'm still stuck. I have read through #384 and it doesn't appear that any of the solutions offered there work at all. I cannot install the custom Magisk if I cannot boot into anything to flash it using Magisk Manager. Further, the release for 0.4.6.0 mentions that the custom Magisk is only required because https://github.com/topjohnwu/Magisk/pull/1685 isn't merged yet, however, a quick look at it shows it closed, and "merged". Someone said the following solution: > Next time, you can boot into the loading screen, connect via adb and then do: > > * adb shell > * su > * touch /cache/.disable_magisk I have attempted to do this, but the su command doesn't actually work, it freezes for a little while and eventually returns `Permission denied` -- after all I cannot give adb root permissions for the first time if I cannot get into the system to get asked to do so. I don't know what to do to get out of this. Help me please. **Xposed Module List** Due to the above issue of not being able to boot into anything besides bootloader, I can't actually give this information because I don't know exactly which modules I had installed. **Magisk Module List** Due to the above issue of not being able to boot into anything besides bootloader, I can't actually give this information because I don't know exactly which modules I had installed. **Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.4.6.0 Riru: 19.6 **Logcat** *It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module* I do not know what logcat module this is talking about, and doubt I could somehow manage to install it currently. Still, the attachment is the result of `adb logcat` so perhaps it will help. [logcat.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/4051944/logcat.txt)

bug.title: [BUG] Linux compilation halts with a path error.
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Linux compilation halts before completion. ``` Caused by: java.io.IOException: Cannot run program "dx" (in directory "/home/ianmacd/src/EdXposed/dalvikdx/build/libs"): error=2, No such file or directory at net.rubygrapefruit.platform.internal.DefaultProcessLauncher.start(DefaultProcessLauncher.java:25) ... 7 more Caused by: java.io.IOException: error=2, No such file or directory ... 8 more ``` Building like this: ``` export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/ndk-bundle:$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/29.0.2 ./gradlew --stacktrace --info :edxp-core:zipSandhookRelease ``` As you can see, both the NDK and the build tools are in my path. This is on Fedora 31. 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** Not applicable. 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Not applicable. 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** Not applicable. bug.title: [BUG] slow boot (also bootloop) and system lag with YAHFA 4495
bug.body: 什么情况/What happened? After installing the YAHFA 4495 build and rebooting my device took a long time to boot and after starting the system was completely slow. I had to remove the module because I need to use my device under normal conditions at the moment. I reinstalled the build now to capture the boot log, waited for about 4 minutes and Android did not boot so I interrupted the process, but I believe it doesn't change anything since the system was clearly looping. I installed it over build 4491, so I can't tell if build 4494 also has this behavior. Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List com.alex193a.watweaker tk.wasdennnoch.scoop EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru EdXposed: YAHFA 4495 Android 9.0 Riru: v19.6 prerelease 相关Logcat/Logcat [liveboot-edx4495.zip](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/4048056/liveboot-edx4495.zip)

bug.title: [BUG] safety net fails on and when run edxposed manager now gets passed.
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Safetynet failed after reboot everytime but when i run edxposed manager and again goto magisk it will be passed and this is random sometimes fails sometime passes even without reboot Samsung galaxy note 9 android 10 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** 19.6 EdXposed: 0.4.6.1 build 4491 Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module Dont know why logs has no issues The only error edxposed keeps showing is this 01-07 17:04:14.148 4913 4913 E EdXposed: can't access config path, using snapshot use_white_list: /data/user/150/com.google.android.gsf 01-07 17:04:14.148 4913 4913 E EdXposed: can't access config path, using snapshot black list: /data/user/150/com.google.android.gsf And this shows for all apps for example play store, calender, play services etc

bug.title: [BUG] system-ui crashes in libart.so
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** my System-UI crashed once again. The guys from GravityBox told me its EdXposed related (see [my issue at GB](https://github.com/GravityBox/GravityBox/issues/2044)) The crashes seem random. Usually after some seconds the lockscreen re-appears, sometimes the crash causes a soft-boot (but without boot-animation) **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** - de.Maxr1998.xposed.maxlock - tw.fatminmin.xposed.minminguard - eu.faircode.xlua - com.fifsource.android.noplaygames - net.darkion.uniformedtransitions - com.tremendo.unclutterig - de.defim.apk.howgivelolli - top.fols.aapp.eternalprocessxposed - kmod.xposed - com.ceco.pie.gravitybox - com.crossbowffs.noautoshortcut - com.mayulive.swiftkeyexi - com.hazemam.InstantScreenOff - tk.wasdennnoch.scoop - me.rapperskull.burnttoastrevived - com.marz.instaprefs but it does not seem module, but core related **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** - BusyBox for Android NDK - Magisk Manager for Recovery Mode (mm) - Riru - Core - Riru - EdXposed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.5.1_beta Sandhook Riru: v19.5 **相关Logcat/Logcat** ``` --------- beginning of system --------- beginning bug.title: 短信相关模块不工作
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** pixel4 手机，android 10，升级12月的安全OTA后，短信Hook相关的模块都无法工作，看日志发现找不到hook短信的方法，OTA之前是能工作的，目前测试了下面两个模块都报同样的错误 https://github.com/apsun/NekoSMS bug.title: [BUG] EdXposed doesn't work on alot of kernels
bug.body: My device is Pocophone F1 (beryllium). EdXposed works only with Arter kernel. It doesn't work with any other kernel only with Arter. It shows that framework is installed, but not a single module works. Please help regarding this.

bug.title: 恢復使用 supolicy 指令會造成任何 service.sh 無法被 Magisk 運行
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 將 post-fs-data.sh 裡現已註解掉的 supolicy 指令取消註解後，會造成任何 Magisk 模組的 service.sh 無法被運行。 之所以希望這麼做主要是因為 Magisk 20.1 的 custom build 無法在我的裝置上正常使用，因此為了在原始版本的 Magisk 20.1 使用目前最新的 EdXposed，還是需要搭配 supolicy 指令。 請問這是 EdXposed 所需的 supolicy 指令會造成 Magisk 出現異常，又或者是 Magisk 本身的異常呢？ **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.6.0 Riru: v19.5 **相关Logcat/Logcat**

bug.title: [BUG] Not working on Android 10.0 x86_64 (Google Play) AVD
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Although Magisk didn't mount riru-core and riru_edxposed_sandhook properly (https://github.com/topjohnwu/Magisk/issues/2112), I still managed to get them loaded on my Android emulator. However, the system didn't boot, it just stuck at boot animation. Without EdXposed, the system could boot normally(https://github.com/RikkaApps/Riru/issues/68). The commands were: ``` su -mm export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/sbin/.magisk/mirror/system/lib64 for TARGETDIR in lib lib64;do mount -t tmpfs tmpfs /system/$TARGETDIR for FILE in /sbin/.magisk/mirror/system/$TARGETDIR/*;do BASENAME=$(/sbin/.magisk/busybox/basename $FILE) if [ -f $FILE ]; then touch /system/$TARGETDIR/$BASENAME; elif [ -d $FILE ];then mkdir /system/$TARGETDIR/$BASENAME; fi mount -o bind $FILE /system/$TARGETDIR/$BASENAME done umount /system/$TARGETDIR/libmemtrack.so cp /sbin/.magisk/modules/riru-core/system_x86/$TARGETDIR/libmemtrack.so /system/$TARGETDIR/libmemtrack.so cp /sbin/.magisk/mirror/system/$TARGETDIR/libmemtrack.so /system/$TARGETDIR/libmemtrack_real.so for BASENAME in libriru_edxp.so libwhale.edxp.so;do cp /sbin/.magisk/modules/riru_edxposed_sandhook/system_x86/$TARGETDIR/$BASENAME /system/$TARGETDIR/$BASENAME done done setprop ctl.restart zygote ``` **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** Nothing. **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru - Core: v19.5 Riru - EdXposed: v0.4.6.0_beta(4471) (SandHook) Systemless Hosts: 1.0 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.6.0_beta(4471) (SandHook) Riru: v19.5 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [riru-edxp-sandhook.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3906758/riru-edxp-sandhook.log)

bug.title: [BUG] EdXposed fail hook WeChat 64-bit version
bug.body: wx模块在Google Play版64位微信7.0.7上完全失效。 WeXposed Module fails hook completely on WeChat 7.0.7 Google Play version 64-bit. ![IMG_20191123_005725](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48885928/69444998-6b991b00-0d8c-11ea-9a50-9972e7b6e17c.jpg) wx模块在国内版64位微信7.0.8上部分失效（有14处适配出错）。 WeXposed Module partial failure hook on WeChat 7.0.8 domestic version 64-bit (there are 14 adaption errors). ![IMG_20191123_005734](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48885928/69445009-6dfb7500-0d8c-11ea-8626-1612b2e2e608.jpg) ![IMG_20191123_005744](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48885928/69445015-70f66580-0d8c-11ea-8045-88f75255e747.jpg) EdXposed: 90.0-v0.4.6.0 beta(4478)(YAHFA) or 90.0-v0.4.6.0 beta(4478)(SandHook) Riru: v19.5

bug.title: [BUG] Cant prevent installation of Edxposed at boot
bug.body: **What happened?** Hi, I got myself in a pickle Im on a Pixel 4 XL. I accidently installed EdXposed 0.4.5.1_beta instead of 0.4.6 and it caused a bootloop I was able to get back into the OS by reflashing the latest OTA update, but I am left with a problem: Any time I reflash Magisk, it recreates /data/adb/modules/riru-core and riru_edxposed_sandhook , the old versions that cause bootloop No matter how many times I go in and delete these folders with ADB, they get recreated any time I reflash Magisk How can I prevent Magisk from reinstalling these modules every boot? Please help! **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** app_systemizer, riru-core, riru_edxposed_sandhook, busybox_ndk **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 4.5.1 beta Riru:

bug.title: [BUG] zygote64 boot loop caused by signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 2 (SEGV_ACCERR)
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** zygote64 crash 并且 boot loop, 但是zygote32是好的 （`app_process32 --zygote` 正确，但是`app_process64 --zygote` 导致Segmentation fault） **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 未安装Magisk，手动安装了riru和riru-edxposed-yahfa， **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 无 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/releases/tag/v0.4.6.0 Riru: https://github.com/RikkaApps/Riru/releases/tag/v19.5 Android Version： [ro.build.version.preview_sdk]: [0] [ro.build.version.release]: [9] [ro.build.version.sdk]: [28] **相关Logcat/Logcat** bug.title: [BUG] modules list not load
bug.body: Latest update doesn't load any module, it says can't load the module.list. The module list is in the correct folder, the manager just doesn't load it. It happens the same with the YAHFA version. bug.title: 小米开发版 7,1系统 面具 刷入成功 安装Ed提示can,t rename system/lib/libart.so
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: 我很喜欢MyAndroidToolsXposed
bug.body: 以前一直是autostarts配合MyAndroidToolsXposed的0.8版本（非MyAndroidTools）来控制阻止自动激活某些自启动事件服务，现在买的新手机是8.1，只能使用edxposed来装模块，现在被autostarts禁用了然后用MyAndroidToolsXposed选择阻止的应用没有效果了，打开那些应用之后相关自启动事件服务还是会被激活。 我不知道是这个模版太老了，还是别的原因，如果不能解决，希望大家给推荐一个完全相关功能的模块或软件，能够完全阻止激活自启动事件服务，我知道市面上有很多别的阻止自启动的软件，但跟这个autostarts完全不一样。

bug.title: When to support Android q
bootloop ob oxygen os android Q[BUG]
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 安装最新版edxposed 之后无限重启无法开机，只能在mm里移除模块 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** mm,riru core v19.4, edxposed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:sandhook latest Riru:v19.4 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Lots of errors, don't know it's a module bug or framework bug **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** GravityBox [O] **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** AOSP Volume Steps Increase 30 ViPER4Android FX Busybox for Android NDK Systemless Hosts YouTube Vanced black themed - Magisk Repo Riru - Core Riru - Edxposed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.5.1_beta (YAHFA) Riru: v19.5 **相关Logcat/Logcat** The zip file [xposed_error_20190920_181146.zip](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3635392/xposed_error_20190920_181146.zip)

bug.title: Device stuck on boot animation
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Device stuck on boot animation Rom- Resurrection Remix Pie Device- Yu Yureka Black 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** Xinsta, Xposed edge, Wa Tweaker 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru core Riru edxposed sandhook Init.d injector Volte enabler Youtube vanced Bash for android Hal3 enabler Busybox for android ndk 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.4.5.1 Riru: 19.4 **相关Logcat/Logcat** https://transfer.sh/LA4jW/xposed_all_20190810_213705.log 助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] Android Q 安装此模块会无法启动
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Android Q 安装此模块会无法启动，卡在开机动画，但是 adb 可以连接。 Pixel 3 QPP5.190530.014 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 无 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** MagiskHide Props Config v4.0.3-v61 Riru-Core v19.4 Riru-Storage Redirect v19.6 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.5.1_beta Riru: v19.4 **相关Logcat/Logcat** https://pastebin.com/qeDMDYd0

bug.title: [BUG] #238（已修复）的问题在Magisk Stable19.3上似乎再次复现了。
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 原本#238 中我反映过edxposed会导致所有magisk模块（包括edxp自身）全部失效的问题，后来edxp更新后修复了此问题。 但现在我将magisk更新到stable 19.3后再次出现了此问题。 edxp版本目前为“magisk-EdXposed-YAHFA-v0.4.5.1_beta.4463.-release”。 系统：Android 9.0（AOSiP Official）

bug.title: [BUG]
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** After installing EdXposed both yahfa and sandhook the phone is taking around 10 mins to boot and sometimes it's doesn't boots at all, my device is a Xiaomi Redmi 6A running MIUI 10, 10.3.3 Global. *Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** Greenify but I didn't even activated it **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru core and Riru EdXposed (Yahfa and Sandhook) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:0.4.5.1_beta(4463) Riru:19.4 **相关Logcat/Logcat** I don't know how to take that in this situation, I can't find this logcat module, sorry.

bug.title: [BUG]
bug.body: 什么情况/What happened? EdXposed v0.4.5.1_beta(4463) Both 2 version YAHFA (or SandHook) boot loop on honor view 10. I could successfully boot on, but after enter the PIN, I got boot loop. It restarts as soon as boot is completed. Root is lost because of that and so I do not get enough time to even disable magisk modules while the phone is booting. Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List None installed Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List YoutubeVanced Systemizer EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru Edxposed v0.4.5.1_beta(4463) Riru: v19 相关Logcat/Logcat None.

bug.title: [BUG]
bug.body: My Torch Flash Light cannot be activated after installing Riru_-_EdXposed-v0.4.5.1_beta(4463)_(SandHook/YAHFA).zip Module. EdXposed Installer 2.2.4 Android 9 AOSP ![Screenshot_20190719-143841](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46316533/61576464-8e78a180-ab04-11e9-8a76-2e7bfd4f6aa8.png) Xiaomi Redmi 4A Pixel Experience Official ROM

bug.title: [Question] 可有针对 EdXposed 的重启调试方案
bug.body: i feel so sorry, there is not an issue template for question. As we know that github issue not works for question, but i still did it . 不好意思，这里似乎没有提问模板,尽管我也知道issue并不是用来咨询的，但苦于无处询问还是提了这个issue。 i want know if there is a way to debug my xp module without restart my phone. in original xposed, i know some tricks to do some experiment without restart. 我想咨询一下，在edxposed方案下，如何做到免重启调试我的xp模块。在原始xp下，我知道几种方式可以做到免重启调试，但似乎在edxposed下不起作用。 anyway thanks for your reading.

bug.title: [BUG]
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 我的手机在开数据流量的情况下重启手机，会掉4g，用不了volte和4g网络，2g网络也用不了， 我想要再次关闭数据开关，然后重启才能解决 而magisk里关闭edxposed模块就不会出现这个问题 不论是ya版本还是sanhook版本都一样， 我不知道是我的手机问题还是edxposed模块问题， 希望能有解决方案 机型：红米Note4x（高通骁龙625） rom：rr Pie **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![Screenshot_20190709-160221_EdXposed_Manager](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52695109/60870239-08866c00-a263-11e9-8710-fc7354a79f4e.png) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![Screenshot_20190709-160332_Manager](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52695109/60870282-1d62ff80-a263-11e9-81f7-f9e8ea9cabd5.png) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.4.5.1 Riru:19.1 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat modul

bug.title: [BUG] EdXposed 0.4.5.1 Both 2 version YAHFA (or SandHook) boot loop on Oneplus 6T Pie
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** EdXposed 0.4.5.1 Both 2 version YAHFA (or SandHook) boot loop on Oneplus 6T Pie. I could successfully boot on, but after enter the PIN, I got boot loop. Then need to use Magisk Manager TWRP to disable EdXposed module then I could boot again. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** CorePatch Minminguard GravityBox **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** YoutubeVanced **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.4.5.1 Riru: v19 **相关Logcat/Logcat** None.

bug.title: [BUG] Broken module resources
bug.body: Right after module APK is installed, resources are available - activity from module opens, launcher icon is displayed, etc. But as soon as you activate module and reboot none of the resources work. I don't experience it on my device (Android 9), but I get bug reports from users of my module (30+ reports with this problem now and counting) and they all have the same error which only happens on Android 8-8.1. Module settings activity cannot be launched because it cannot find the layout xml file in resources. Icon in launchers changes to a default system icon, most likely because original is not available. Error happens on a wide range of EdXposed versions up to 0.4.3.7_alpha. All devices are Xiaomi devices with MIUI ROMs. Xposed logs (from older versions, where they were working) don't contain any errors that could explain what's wrong. Activity crash stack trace: ``` java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to start activity ComponentInfo{name.mikanoshi.customiuizer/name.mikanoshi.customiuizer.MainActivity}: android.content.res.Resources$NotFoundException: File res/layout/activity_main.xml from xml type layout resource ID #0x7f0b0000 at android.app.ActivityThread.performLaunchActivity(Unknown Source:524) at android.app.ActivityThread.handleLaunchActivity(Unknown Source:37) at android.app.ActivityThread.-wrap11(Unknown Source:0) at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(Unknown Source:80) at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Unknown Source:21) at android.os.Looper.loop(Unknown Source:152) at android.app.ActivityThread.main(Unknown Source:65) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method) at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(Unknown Source:11) at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(Unknown Source:338) Caused by: android.content.res.Resources$NotFoundException: File res/layout/activity_main.xml from xml type layout resource ID #0x7f0b0000 at android.content.res.ResourcesImpl.loadXmlResourceParser(Unknown Source:190) at android.content.res.Resources.loadXmlResourceParser(Unknown Source:23) at android.content.res.Resources.getLayout(Unknown Source:3) at android.content.res.XResources.getLayout(XResources.java:962) at android.view.LayoutInflater.inflate(Unknown Source:16) at android.view.LayoutInflater.inflate(Unknown Source:3) at com.android.internal.policy.PhoneWindow.setContentView(Unknown Source:70) at android.app.Activity.setContentView(Unknown Source:4) at name.mikanoshi.customiuizer.MainActivity.onCreate(MainActivity.java:41) at android.app.Activity.performCreate(Unknown Source:48) at android.app.Activity.performCreate(Unknown Source:1) at android.app.Instrumentation.callActivityOnCreate(Unknown Source:3) at android.app.ActivityThread.performLaunchActivity(Unknown Source:466) ... 9 more Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: res/layout/activity_main.xml at android.content.res.AssetManager.openXmlAssetNative(Native Method) at android.content.res.AssetManager.openXmlBlockAsset(Unknown Source:17) at android.content.res.ResourcesImpl.loadXmlResourceParser(Unknown Source:48) ... 21 more ```

bug.title: [BUG] essential phone Android Q beta3无效
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** edxposed刷入后无效 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:4.2.3 Riru:19.1 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] error when hooking
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 在酷派 Adnroid 9.0 上 hook 我的模块 io.xiakeapp 报错 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.1.2_beta Riru: 19.2 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 2019-06-04 10:20:34.634 4846-4846/io.xiakeapp:p2 E/====DreamHook===: io.xiakeapp这个是包名 2019-06-04 10:20:40.110 4846-4846/com.tencent.mm E/EdXposed-Fwk: error when hooking LoadedApk.<init>: pkg=io.xiakeapp, prc=io.xiakeapp java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to read from null array at android.app.LoadedApk.setupJitProfileSupport(LoadedApk.java:844) at android.app.LoadedApk.createOrUpdateClassLoaderLocked(LoadedApk.java:803) at android.app.LoadedApk.getClassLoader(LoadedApk.java:810) at com.elderdrivers.riru.edxp.sandhook.entry.hooker.LoadedApkConstructorHooker.hook(LoadedApkConstructorHooker.java:90) at android.app.ActivityThread.getPackageInfo(ActivityThread.java:2092) at android.app.ActivityThread.getPackageInfo(ActivityThread.java:2047) at android.app.ActivityThread.getPackageInfo(ActivityThread.java:2019) at android.app.ContextImpl.createPackageContextAsUser(ContextImpl.java:2100) at android.app.ContextImpl.createPackageContext(ContextImpl.java:2087) at com.lody.virtual.client.VClientImpl.createPackageContext(VClientImpl.java:724) at com.lody.virtual.client.VClientImpl.bindApplicationNoCheck(VClientImpl.java:415) at com.lody.virtual.client.VClientImpl.bindApplication(VClientImpl.java:268) at com.lody.virtual.client.VClientImpl.handleReceiver(VClientImpl.java:892) at com.lody.virtual.client.VClientImpl.access$700(VClientImpl.java:113) at com.lody.virtual.client.VClientImpl$H.handleMessage(VClientImpl.java:980) at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:106) at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:193) at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:6746) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method) at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:493) at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:858)

bug.title: [BUG] XModuleResources.createInstance causes Resources$NotFoundException
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** MinMinGuard crashes and app icon changes to the default app icon when drawable/abc_vector_test isnt found. This only happens when XModuleResources.createInstance() is called with startupParam.modulePath,null inside initZygote. It only seems to happen on certain devices, especially on chinese phones like xiaomi. 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** Happens on all EdXposed versions > 0.2.9.8. Older versions doesnt seem to have this problem, though this is only reported to me. I dont have a phone to test it with **相关Logcat/Logcat** https://dl.xda-developers.com/4/7/6/6/7/4/8/alogcat.2019-05-27-16-50-04-0300.txt?key=IFvkcfnplg1oQOw-MAx2QQ&ts=1559590649

bug.title: [BUG]Unable to stat fd 4 : Permission denied

bug.title: [BUG] 开启微x，微信有几率无法启动
bug.body: 用SandHook版微信有几率无法启动卡死，结束微信进程后才能启动微信，有时候要重复几次才能启动微信

bug.title: [Features] 自动匹配apk路径
bug.body: 在很久以前，一个apk安装之后，apk会复制到/data/app/packname中 但某个版本之后，这个路径最后的包名上会附加一串随机字符串， 比如/data/app/SomeSoftWare-sfdsafsf23 这样就导致，插件更新后 xposed会无法根据modulelist读取到相应的apk，导致插件失效 所以这个路径能不能改成匹配模式，忽略掉后面的随机字符串。 每次都要点一下 好麻烦呀 TAT

bug.title: [BUG] hook失效后 直接退出方法
bug.body: XposedHelpers.findClass()这个接口本身用来读取class的 但是我发现一个问题，如果这个接口报了ClassNotFond错误，会直接退出整个hook接口 也就是之后的hook无法执行。 比如handleLoadPackage我写了三个hook，结果中间的那个hook的类找不到了 那么第三个hook就不会执行 我改成了原生的 Class.forName(className,false,classLoader) 然后try catch 异常 就ok了

bug.title: [BUG] miui10 安卓8.1哔哩布丁功能不生效
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 哔哩布丁显示激活，但功能不生效，哔哩哔哩版本也符合布丁要求，布丁上也显示支持，但是打开哔哩哔哩却没有一个功能生效 如果能修复这个就真的完美了，自从上个版本有了资源钩子后，qq破解闪照不会一直刷新头像了，但是系统流畅度明显降低，可以感受到明显的卡顿，这个版本已经没有任何卡顿感了，如果能修复哔哩布丁这个bug就真的是完美了！ **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** 19 EdXposed: 4.2.3 Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] Latest alpha breaks SafetyNet
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** On my Pixel 3 XL, the latest alpha causes SafetyNet to fail both ctsProfile and basicIntegrity. The previous beta passes SafetyNet. This occurs even with all Xposed modules disabled and only the framework active. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** * [Screenshot_20190518-093928](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25443872/57970585-f538dd80-7950-11e9-90e8-6cadc62effe2.png) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** * [Screenshot_20190518-094046](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25443872/57970589-0e418e80-7951-11e9-9213-3b79950d5faf.png) * [Screenshot_20190518-094055](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25443872/57970591-15689c80-7951-11e9-83b6-b5d09ee7cbe0.png) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: magisk-EdXposed-SandHook-v0.4.2.3_alpha-release Riru: v19 **相关Logcat/Logcat** Did not see anything suspect in logcat, and there are no crashes, etc.

bug.title: [BUG] 无法hook Application的attach方法
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 自己开发的xposed插件遇到了一个问题，Riru core可以使用任意版本，但是EdXposed最高只能使用v0.2.9.9，使用更新的所有版本都无法正常运行。经过排查，代码中如下部分在高版本中无效 代码部分: ``` //part 1: override fun handleLoadPackage(lpparam: XC_LoadPackage.LoadPackageParam) { ... XposedHelpers.findAndHookMethod(Application::class.java, "attach", Context::class.java, object : XC_MethodHook() { @Throws(Throwable::class) override fun afterHookedMethod(param: XC_MethodHook.MethodHookParam?) { ... LogUtil.i(TAG, "start hookRpcCall") XposedHelpers.findAndHookMethod(Application::class.java, "attach", Context::class.java, ApplicationAttachMethodHook()) LogUtil.i(TAG, "start hookRpcCall end") } }) } //part 2: private inner class ApplicationAttachMethodHook : XC_MethodHook() { @Throws(Throwable::class) override fun beforeHookedMethod(param: XC_MethodHook.MethodHookParam?) { super.beforeHookedMethod(param) LogUtil.i(TAG, "ApplicationAttachMethodHook beforeHookedMethod") } @Throws(Throwable::class) override fun afterHookedMethod(param: XC_MethodHook.MethodHookParam?) { LogUtil.i(TAG, "ApplicationAttachMethodHook afterHookedMethod") ... } } ``` 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.4.1.2 & v0.2.9.9 Riru: v19 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat bug.title: [BUG] Lots of Errors after Enable Resources Hooking
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Noticed LOTS of errors in log after enable resource hooking, although modules works fine **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** I disabled every modules, still get those errors **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** App Systemizer, Busybox for Android NDK, Disable screenshot and camera sounds, Magisk Manager for Recovery Mode (mm), Riru - Core, Riru - Ed Xposed, Systemless Hosts, ViPER4Android FX, Youtube Vanced black themed- Magisk Repo **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 90.0-v0.4.1.0_beta (YAHFA) Riru: v19 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [xposed_all_20190514_081234.zip](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3178991/xposed_all_20190514_081234.zip)

bug.title: [BUG] 华为mate20 pro 刷最新的卡开机，只能用0.2.9.6+riru11,刷最新的就卡开机
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] 开机卡在动画界面，无法进入系统
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** pixel2,原生Pie，may 2019 update. 开机卡在G标loading界面。一开始安装edxposed 0.4.1.2-sandhook，重启并未发生卡死，但是似乎使用一段时间后，重启手机就会卡住。这时用mm禁掉edxposed模块，重启就能正常进入系统。然后再重新激活edxpoxed模块，重启又可以正常进入系统，然后使用一段时间后重启又会卡住。 YAHFA版本还在实验中，有问题会继续更新。 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** App locale2 fingerprint pay greenify xprivacylua 微信增强 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** app systemizer mm riru riru-edxposed riru-location report enabler riru-storage redirect voenabler pixel2 volte enabler for china **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.4.1.2-sandhook Riru: v19 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [bootloop1.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3173607/bootloop1.txt)

bug.title: [BUG] 微信6.7.3收藏闪退问题
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 使用微X后，在微信版本6.7.3下，点击收藏会闪退，已经跟微X作者确认是edxposed的问题 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.3.1.7与0.4.1.2均有该问题 Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat** E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main Process: com.tencent.mm, PID: bug.title: [BUG] 刷入edxposed后，导致所有magisk模块失效。
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 当未刷入edxposed模块时，其它所有magisk模块（包括riru模块）均正常工作。 当刷入edxposed模块后，所有magisk模块（包括edxp模块）均失效，例如emoji替换、sub主题模块、vanced等模块失效，且edxp manager或installer会提示框架未安装（不是“未激活”）。也就是说这些magisk模块挂载的文件实际未挂载到系统分区中。 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** > com.surcumference.fingerprintpay com.elderdrivers.googlesearchbox ru.WBWYnech.MPOTOnuIO top.fols.aapp.eternalprocessxposed io.shortway.appcontext com.github.tianma8023.xposed.smscode liubaoyua.customtext com.oasisfeng.greenify pub.chara.cwui.pretendsharing_xposed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** > Advanced Charging Controller (acc) Riru - Core Riru - Ed Xposed S9 Emoji for Magisk Screen Recorder Setting summary text fix substratum YouTube Vanced - Magisk Repo **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.3.1.7（也试过0.4.1.2 SandHook和YAHFA） Riru: v18 Magisk: Stable 19.1 Android: Pie(AOSIP) **相关Logcat/Logcat** [liveboot_edxp.log （刷入edxp模块后的开机日志](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3145333/liveboot_edxp.log) [liveboot_noedxp.log （刷入edxp模块前的开机日志](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3145334/liveboot_noedxp.log) 因为刷入edxp后magisk模块无法工作，所以用liveboot抓取了开机启动时的日志。 如果该日志对排查没有帮助，请告诉我其它方法，谢谢！

bug.title: [BUG] [XPOSED API] afterHook callback called when it shouldn't
bug.body: When param.setResult is called in beforeHookedMethod callback, afterHookedMethod callback should not be called afterwards but it actually is. Looks like there is something wrong about handling returnEarly flag. The same behavior in YAHFA as well as Sandhook.

bug.body: 什么情况/What happened? device: Mi A2 Lite, stock rom Android PIE Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List Gravity Box [P] Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List NotchKiller, Pix3lify (FULL), Riru - Core. Riru - Ed Xposed, Youtube Vanced EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru EdXposed: v0.3.1.7 beta Riru: v18 If EdXposed v0.3.1.7_beta magisk module is activated, mobile data does not work. It does not matter which Riru core version I use. If I use EdXposed v0.2.9.9_beta2, then mobila data works, but this version of EdXposed is really buggy. I am use stock Pie rom V10.0.7 for Mi A2 Lite, but it was the same with V10.0.4.

bug.title: [Question] Is there a way to set the priority of a module?
bug.body: There is a "priority" property for ``XCallback``, but I didn't find a way to set the priority for a class implements ``IXposedHookLoadPackage``, since it's not a subclass of ``XCallback``

bug.title: 请问能兼容3c toolbox吗？
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 3c toolbox的权限管理功能需要xposed支持，但在edxposed中勾选3c toolbox，重启后3c toolbox依旧提示未启用模块。（其它模块例如文本自定义、PCB、Undo等都正常工作。） **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:0.3.1.7（edxposed manager 4.2.1 标准工作模式） Riru:v18

input = null; try { Process p = Runtime.getRuntime().exec("getprop " + name); input = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(p.getInputStream()), 1024); line = input.readLine(); input.close(); } catch (IOException ex) { Log.e(TAG, "Unable to read prop " + name, ex); return null; } finally { if (input != null) { try { input.close(); } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } } return bug.title: [BUG] Framework not answering
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** When I try to start any modules - nothing happened. For example, MinMinGuard says, that Exposed not found, or just not starting. GravityBox says that framework not answers. Also in EdXposed installer message "Xposed Framework version 90.0-0.3.1.7-beta active" is always green (regardless of whether the switch "Status Xposed" is on or off). Can you help me understand what wrong with my device, please? How can I use EdXposed on my Sharp Aquos (Android 8.0)? **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** EdXposedInstaller_v2.2.4-release MinMinGuard GravityBox [O] 允许截图/Screenshot allowed ![Screenshot_2019-04-06-13-53-55](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17968134/55669360-fa4d3c00-587e-11e9-9d74-8e5e47808908.png) ![Screenshot_2019-04-06-13-54-08](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17968134/55669367-046f3a80-587f-11e9-8474-353082f6d3c2.png) ![Screenshot_2019-04-06-16-01-34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17968134/55669887-79de0980-5885-11e9-94ba-9ec5265e03b8.png) ![Screenshot_2019-04-06-15-59-00](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17968134/55669896-84000800-5885-11e9-9700-44bb826e0998.png) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Magisk v19.0 Magisk Manager v7.1.1 magisk-riru-core-v17.1 magisk-EdXposed-v0.3.1.7_beta-release (also trying EdXposed-sandhook-v0.3.1.8_beat7--SHOT-release) 允许截图/Screenshot allowed ![Screenshot_2019-04-06-15-57-38](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17968134/55669910-a8f47b00-5885-11e9-9075-258834a47e20.png) ![Screenshot_2019-04-06-15-57-45](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17968134/55669894-84000800-5885-11e9-966c-1a7294a292f2.png) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.3.1.7_beta, v0.3.1.8_beta Riru: Riru Core v17.1 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [xposed_all_20190406_155958.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3050472/xposed_all_20190406_155958.log) [xposed_error_20190406_155931.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/3050473/xposed_error_20190406_155931.log)

bug.title: [BUG] Safetynet does not pass after a few hours after installing EdXposed.

bug.title: [BUG] 三星S9+刷最新会卡第二屏 只能用2.9.8版本
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 开机卡第二屏 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat**Logcat不知道怎么提取 只有libart /system/lib/libart.so [libart.zip](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2999205/libart.zip) 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] 三星S9+只能用2.9.8版本 以后的版本都会卡第二屏

bug.title: [BUG] Cannot run Module after upgrade module version.
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** While Upgrading GravityBox v9.0.0-beta-3 to GravityBox v9.0.0-beta-4 Or sometimes upgrading other modules - The new upgraded version hangs at first after reboot - Sometimes upgraded version caused bootloop. - Clear the Riru - Core and Riru - Ed Xposed from Recovery then reflash them on Magisk once more time - New upgraded module works ***As my investigation*** In the log, there was some kind of compare module name and xpose called the old module version but not the new one to load -> this could caused the module doesn't work after upgrading. ``` 03-19 18:29:36.404 699 699 I EdXposed-Bridge: Loading modules from /data/app/com.ceco.pie.gravitybox-V4ltiLxioVB727G9H-QgzQ==/base.apk ``` **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** - GravityBox v9.0.0 - CorePatch - Maxlock - Minminguard - SMS code extractor - Statusbardownload **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** - Riru - Core - Riru - Ed Xposed - YouTube Vanced - Magisk Repo **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** - EdXposed: v0.3.1.5_beta - Riru: v17.1 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [xposed_error_20190319_183643.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2986453/xposed_error_20190319_183643.log) 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] Bootloop after installing EdXposed
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** After flashing latest ResurrectionRemix (7.0.1 for Mido https://get.resurrectionremix.com/?dir=mido) phone is stuck in bootloop. It's caused by EdXposed - when I leave only Riru in my magisk modules, the phone boots normally. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** Doesn't matter - problem happens even without modules installed/enabled. **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru and EdXposed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.3.0.0_beta2 Riru: v16 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [log.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2949712/log.txt)

bug.title: [BUG] XSharedPreferences are not working from hooks
bug.body: https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/issues/130#issuecomment-471281625 Can't make XSharedPreferences work inside any hooks. Tried adding selinux policies, tried switching to permissive - nothing helps, I don't even have avc messages in log, it just fails silently. For example, hook **android.widget.Toast.makeText()** in initZygote() and try to get module's preferences there: ``` XSharedPreferences pref = new XSharedPreferences(modulePkg, prefsName); XposedBridge.log(pref.getAll().toString()); ``` It only returns an empty result. If I create XSharedPreferences in initZygote() directly and assign it to static class var, then I can use it in hooks, but only until reload() is called, then it becomes empty again. I also tried to call `pref.makeWorldReadable()`, xml permissions are 664 currently.

Context.class, new XC_MethodHook() { @Override protected void afterHookedMethod(MethodHookParam param) { HashSet<ComponentName> mSkippedItems = (HashSet<ComponentName>) XposedHelpers.getObjectField(param.thisObject, "mSkippedItems"); hideAppList.forEach(name -> mSkippedItems.add(new ComponentName(name, name))); XposedBridge.log("我进来了2"); } }); bug.title: [BUG] Several bootloops/attempts until device finally boots
bug.body: **What happened?** Often it takes several bootloops until device finally boots. Sometimes boot recovers automatically after several crashes, other times full reboot is required to boot the OS. Behavior seems to be random - I was not able to find a pattern. **Device and OS** Nexus 5X running Pixel Experience - Android 9.0 Pie built from AOSP **Xposed Module List** - GravityBox for Pie (my own module in development) **Magisk Module List** - Riru - EdExposed **Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.3.0.0_beta1 Riru: v15-mod **Logcat** - boot_crash 1 - 3 occurred before device could finally boot [boot_crash1.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2926504/boot_crash1.txt) [boot_crash2.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2926505/boot_crash2.txt) [boot_crash3.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2926506/boot_crash3.txt) - full_bootlog contains full log of the boot sequence [full_bootlog.txt](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2926507/full_bootlog.txt)

bug.title: [BUG] 与 Riru: storage-redirect-v17 冲突
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 在刷入EdXposed可以确定开机之后继续刷入magisk-riru-storage-redirect-v17重启后bootloop **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 未成功启动 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru EdXposed magisk-riru-storage-redirect-v17 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed :v0.3.0.0_b1 Riru: v15 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [bootlog.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2926014/bootlog.log) 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] RR-P卡在开机动画
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 卡在开机动画 ResurrectionRemix v7.0.0 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![screenshot_20190304163826](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34204709/53720627-2b130d80-3e9c-11e9-82f4-1b41c7285a1a.jpg) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 仅启用 riru-core-v15-mod EdXposed-v0.3.0.0_beta1 riru-storage-redirect-v17 **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:0.3.0.0-b1 Riru:v15-mod **相关Logcat/Logcat* 管理器log [error.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2924959/error.log) liveboot log [liveboot.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2924961/liveboot.log) 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] 日志界面点击分享导致闪退
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** LinageOS16(Android9.0)在日志页面点击顶部的分享图标会闪退 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 应用变量 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** rriu-core rriu-edXposed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:v0.3.0.0_beta1 Riru:v15 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [bootloop-2019-03-04-16-36-00.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2924927/bootloop-2019-03-04-16-36-00.log)

bug.title: [BUG]
bug.body: **What happened?** Stuck on boot. Uninstalling the module, the boot is normal. **Xposed Module List** None (because EdXposed is not working) **Magisk Module List** EdXposed 0.3.0.0 beta1 Riru ​​v15-mod **Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.3.0.0 beta1 Riru: ​​v15-mod

bug.title: [BUG] RR-N 卡在开机动画
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Android Nougat 7.1.2 r36 CyanogenMod 14.1 ResurrectionRemix v5.8.5 刷入后开机开在动画 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 无/未安装管理器 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Busybox Riru core EdXposed 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.2.9.9_beta2 Riru: v15 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 暂未抓取/以后提供 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] 刷入最新0.3.0.0 beta1 后bootloop
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 无法开机，bootloop **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** x-apm ， xprivacyLua ， 全局复制 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** riru-core-v15 riru-storageredirect **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.3.0.0 beta1 Riru: v15-mod **相关Logcat/Logcat** [magisk.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2922228/magisk.log) 从rec中提取出的magisk开机log,禁用模块后依旧无法开机，卸载后才能正常使用。 还原回 riru-v15 和 0.2.9.9 beta2 正常使用

bug.title: [BUG] 多用户模式报错
bug.body: 用shelter建立的工作账户之内给Root运行EdXposed激活模块以及编辑白名单时报错。 错误日志：Cannot read log/data/user_de/0/org.meowcat.edxposed.manager/log/error.log (No such file or directory) EdXposed报错： ![screenshot_2019-03-02-15-18-37](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45599844/53679009-c754dd00-3d01-11e9-8797-334acf662fc7.jpg) 更改模块报错： ![screenshot_2019-03-02-15-22-12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45599844/53679010-c7ed7380-3d01-11e9-8a1b-3fd5a899e723.jpg) Magisk: ![screenshot_2019-03-02-15-44-06](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45599844/53679079-8c06de00-3d02-11e9-99c1-9a1fd9bbf80e.jpg)

bug.title: [BUG] OS crashing during BOOT_COMPLETED event
bug.body: **What happened?** Device OS crashes and reboots after booting during the BOOT_COMPLETED event. **Xposed Module List** - AppOpsXposed Re 1.30.5 - Forced Screen Rotation Mod 1.6 - ForceDoze 1.4.0 - Lucky Patcher 8.1.9 - Physical Button Music Control 4.1 - Statusbar download progress 3.6.1 - Xperia Keyboard Prediction Toggle 1.6 **Magisk Module List** - LogCat Bootloop v10 - Riru - Core v15 - Single User Mod v1.5 - Sysconfig Patcher 2018.10.22 - Systemless Hosts 1.0 - YouTube Vanced v14.06.54 **Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.2.9.9_beta3 (ff59554) Riru: v15 (release) **Logcat** [bootloop-2019-03-01-21-15-55.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2920931/bootloop-2019-03-01-21-15-55.log)

bug.title: [BUG] Whitelisting sub-packages
bug.body: I'm having an issue with whitelisting sub-packages (probably a better name for this). For example - I'm whitelisting `com.android.settings` which appears in the whitelist list. But this app also has a package named `com.samsung.android.settings`, which doesn't appear in the whitelist list. When I want to hook methods that are in `com.samsung.android.settings` I need to find them in the `com.android.settings` classLoader. Hooks that use `com.android.settings` work, but those who call `com.samsung.android.settings` don't.

bug.title: [BUG] 最新版引起miui10 小米6设置什么的错误。进程停止运行
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: Riru: **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] 微信“收藏”引起闪退
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 使用微x时，点击微信-我-收藏，崩溃。 我的微信版本6.6.7 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![screenshot_2019-02-26-19-53-44-851_com solohsu android edxp manager](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11990604/53411123-a4c07c80-3a00-11e9-9916-9469f86d7bd9.png) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![screenshot_2019-02-26-19-53-34-310_com topjohnwu magisk](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11990604/53411136-ad18b780-3a00-11e9-86a5-17997091800a.png) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.2.9.9.b2 Riru: v15 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] 红米note4 miui10 安卓6.0 开机无限重启
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 红米note4 miui10 安卓版本6.0 无法开机 第二屏无限重启 如无法开机/模块无效等 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 未启用xp 进不去系统 **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru v15 edxp 2.9.9 bata2 bug.title: [BUG] Xposed module preferences are not accessible from platform apps on some devices
bug.body: **What happened?** Xposed module cannot read preferences from other than system server zygote and android process. E.g. com.android.systemui cannot access module preferences. Preference file permissions are OK. Whether module uses standard or device protected storage doesn't play a role. **Xposed Module List** Only one module - my own module in development. **Magisk Module List** Magisk version: v18.1 Magisk modules: Riru, EdXposed **Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.2.9.9-beta2 Riru: v15 **Device and OS** Nexus5X running Pixel Experience - Android Pie 9.0 built from AOSP. **Logcat** ``` 02-23 10:59:50.304 4556 4556 W XSharedPreferen: type=1400 audit(0.0:1948): avc: denied { search } for name="com.ceco.pie.gravitybox" dev="mmcblk0p45" ino=597333 scontext=u:r:platform_app:s0:c512,c768 tcontext=u:object_r:app_data_file:s0:c96,c256,c512,c768 tclass=dir permissive=0 ```

bug.title: [BUG] 一加5 phoenix ROM Andriod P开机卡第二屏
bug.body: 卡在第二屏无法开机 无模块 EdXposed:2.20 Riru:0.2.9.9 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module [xposed_error_20190222_221837.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2894419/xposed_error_20190222_221837.log)

bug.title: [Question] Enable file access services
bug.body: I am trying to give and access file preferences, but it doesn't seem to work. I see that file access services are not implemented yet and I should use magiskpolicy to enable needed SELinux policies. Any quick guide on how I should to that? I can't find anything explaning this.

bug.title: [BUG] 三星9 oneui pie edxposed无效
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 如无法开机/模块无效等 模块无效 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** riru v12 edxposed 0.2.9.9_beta1 允许截图/Screenshot allowed ![screenshot_20190220-161754_manager](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47808503/53073349-c2827300-3522-11e9-9686-4e8f7b6424a7.jpg) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** riru v12 edxposed 0.2.9.9_beta1 允许截图/Screenshot allowed ![screenshot_20190220-161833_manager](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47808503/53073379-d6c67000-3522-11e9-8e5b-1b34a0e4b8a6.jpg) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed:0.2.9.9_beta1 Riru:v13 **相关Logcat/Logcat** [boot-2019-02-20-16-20-24.log](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/files/2883452/boot-2019-02-20-16-20-24.log) 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] Xposed is in active status, but module apps not functioning
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Xposed is in active status, but module apps not working and keep prompted for install xposed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed : https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Tyn080-FYb0ol6V3wh0XZ06UmzFSo44m **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 2.9.8 beta 1 Riru: v13 **相关Logcat/Logcat** No xposed log (log is empty), only magisk log provided.

bug.title: [功能请求] 能不能让指定模块对指定app有效？
bug.body: 让指定模块对指定的app生效，对其他app不生效，这样可以减少很多的fc几率，毕竟大多数的模块都是针对单一或几个app的。

bug.title: [BUG] v0.2.9.9_beta1在三星s9+上开启了框架，但勾选xposed edge pro 提示未安装xposed
bug.body: v0.2.9.8_beta1版开始，在三星s9+上开启了框架，但勾选xposed edge pro 提示未安装xposed，望作者设配三星9.0系统，谢谢

bug.title: v0.2.9.9_beta1 - Xposed not installed
bug.body: I just upgraded to v0.2.9.9_beta1 from v0.2.9.8_beta1 and now xposed installer reports xposed framework is not installed.

bug.title: [BUG] hook location not working oreo
bug.body: Hi, hook android location (latitude and longitude) works great on Pie (AOSP Rom). But I got strange bugs on MIUI 10 (Oreo). The error log "E/LocSvc_SystemStatus: PQWM1parser - invalid size=23" shows every times. After that error log show up, the device can't get current location until I force kill app module, and then current location works normal again. Any suggestions about this error? Thanks so much.

bug.body: 三星s9+国行9.0系统，无太极模块，无法启用

bug.title: [BUG] ColorQQ开启后QQ无法正常启动
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 开启ColorQQ后打开QQ，会黑屏一段时间后出现启动图，很快继续黑屏，一段时间后再出现启动图……无法进入QQ。（ColorQQ是一个QQ美化模块，链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1rjIQMPHlenmINAHZ8EQieA 提取码：oen1） **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![2019-2-17_19-38-35](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47712894/52912389-db551380-32eb-11e9-895a-60864829c360.PNG) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![2019-2-17_19-44-25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47712894/52912442-8665cd00-32ec-11e9-9920-5dd4b6c2bb22.PNG) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.2.9.8_beta1 （之前版本也一样） Riru: v11/v13 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: 启用音量放大器后，黑名单疑似不工作[BUG]
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 启用音量放大器（0.27-0.30）后，黑名单模式疑似不工作。 1.温州银行和中国移动，两个app均检测xp（检测到就拒绝运行或卡启动页）。 2.我将他们都加入edxp黑名单模式下的的黑名单中，两者均能运行（黑名单功能有效，因为防xp检测成功） 3.装上音量放大器后，两者都不能运行（黑名单功能失效？） 疑似音量放大器与edxp的黑名单功能冲突 我向音量的作者反映issue，对方表示不是音量放大器的锅。 https://github.com/bin456789/Unblock163MusicClient-Xposed/issues/175 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![screenshot_2019-02-17-16-25-09-648_com solohsu android edxp manager](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11990604/52910339-1d249080-32d1-11e9-84c7-dcbc85695d85.png) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![screenshot_2019-02-17-16-25-17-835_com topjohnwu magisk](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11990604/52910347-3594ab00-32d1-11e9-9867-b281a3e90ad1.png) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: 0.2.9.8 Riru: v12（v11结果一样） **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] hook了所有类的同名方法
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** hook了Application.class的attach(Context)方法,但是在其他地方也会调用并且param.thisObject不是Application **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 自制模块 <details> `` public class mainxposed implements IXposedHookLoadPackage { @Override public void handleLoadPackage(final XC_LoadPackage.LoadPackageParam lpparam) throws Throwable { if(BuildConfig.APPLICATION_ID.equals(lpparam.packageName)){ XposedHelpers.findAndHookMethod("pub.chara.cwui.cwtools.utils.XposedUtil",lpparam.classLoader,"getBuildInt",XC_MethodReplacement.returnConstant(BuildConfig.VERSION_CODE)); return; } XSharedPreferences preferences = new XSharedPreferences(BuildConfig.APPLICATION_ID,lpparam.packageName); if(!preferences.getBoolean("isExist", false)){ preferences = new XSharedPreferences(BuildConfig.APPLICATION_ID,"global"); if(!preferences.getBoolean("isExist",false)) return; } for (CharaModule module : Constant.modules) { module.attach(lpparam,preferences); } final XSharedPreferences finalPreferences = preferences; XposedHelpers.findAndHookMethod(Application.class, "attach", Context.class, new XC_MethodHook() { @Override protected void afterHookedMethod(MethodHookParam param) throws Throwable { Context context = (Context) param.args[0]; Application thisApplication = (Application) param.thisObject; //line 37 for (CharaModule module : Constant.modules) { module.attachFromApplication(lpparam,thisApplication,context,finalPreferences); } } }); } } `` </details> **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** bug.title: [BUG] 无法Hook包名 'com.android.phone'
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 我是 [XposedSmsCode](https://github.com/tianma8023/XposedSmsCode) 的开发者，我在适配 `EdXposed` 的过程中，发现核心 Hook 的部分 [SmsHandlerHook](https://github.com/tianma8023/XposedSmsCode/blob/master/app/src/main/java/com/github/tianma8023/xposed/smscode/xp/SmsHandlerHook.java) 没办法成功 Hook，原因在于没办法 Hook 包 `com.android.phone`，以至于整个模块无效。在 `rovo98` 的 `Xposed` 中能正常运转。 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** ![screenshot_2019-02-15-13-01-51-637_com solohsu an](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7833704/52835568-efe5b000-3121-11e9-823c-8f4e3af776ae.png) **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** ![screenshot_2019-02-15-12-48-49-572_com topjohnwu](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7833704/52835272-bfe9dd00-3120-11e9-8635-86787406137d.png) **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** Rom：Xiaomi.eu 9.1.24 MIUI10 - Android 9.0 Magisk: v18.1 EdXposed: 0.2.9.8_beta1 Riru: riru-core-v11 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] Doesn't seem to work on xiaomi.eu MIUI 10.3 (Xiaomi Mi Mix 2S)
bug.body: **What happened?** ROM is xiaomi.eu MIUI 10.3 24/01/2019; Android 9 After installing both Magisk modules, the Xposed Installer shows the green check mark, but the modules don't seem to work. I've tried installing XInsta, which is included in the list of supported modules, but no matter what, it doesn't want to function. I've tried cleaning the ART cache from recovery, adding Instagram to the compat mode list, forcing resetting compiled code, enabling global mode, but nothing seems to help. Am I doing something wrong or is this a compatibility issue? ![screenshot_2019_02_12_22_12_58_982_com](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10375754/52668356-a1fb5d00-2f13-11e9-9db1-ef7853a0d646.png) ![screenshot_2019-02-12-22-13-20-654_com topjohnwu magisk](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10375754/52668361-a32c8a00-2f13-11e9-9708-7e4485c7f67e.png) **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** XInsta **Magisk Module List** ![screenshot_2019-02-12-22-07-50-881_com topjohnwu magisk](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10375754/52668335-9871f500-2f13-11e9-9a69-60482c8ddb6c.png) ![screenshot_2019-02-12-22-07-52-995_com topjohnwu magisk](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10375754/52668338-9a3bb880-2f13-11e9-98dd-29fc75413a0a.png) **/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.2.9.8_beta1 Riru: v11 **Logcat** It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module

bug.title: [BUG] Cubot Magic bootloop
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** I tried to install it on my Cubot Magic, (Riru caused no issue, it was only after I installed the EdXposed module that the device was stuck in a bootloop (had to use uninmod to uninstall the module)), but it sent my device into a bootloop. Oh, and the phone became unusable because of a force-close message for the Google Play services popping up all the time even after I uninstalled the modules. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** None, as I didn't get Xposed to run because of the bootloop. **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** - GBoard Themes - Busybox for Android **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.2.9.8_beta1 Riru: v10 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 有助于定位问题，必须使用我们的log抓取模块抓取/It can help us to locate issue, must use our logcat module I couldn't get that one because the phone became unusable due to this annoying error message.
