bug.title: [BUG] Snaptools + EdXposed crashes Snapchat
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** Snapchat is crashing when enabling SnapTools module. Problem is related to EdXposed - on previous Android versions (7.0 and 8.1) with original Xposed it was working properly, crashes started occuring after changing ROM to Resurrection Remix 7.0.0 (Android 9.0). **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** XPrivacyLua, XInsta, SnapTools **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Riru - Core, Riru - Ed Xposed, Systemless Hosts, Youtube Vanced **EdXposed及Riru版本/Versions of EdXposed and Riru** EdXposed: v0.2.9.5_beta Riru: v11 **相关Logcat/Logcat** com.snapchat.androi I The ClassLoaderContext is a special shared library. MultiDex I VM with version 2.1.0 has multidex support I Installing application I VM has multidex support, MultiDex support library is disabled. AndroidRuntime D Shutting down VM E FATAL EXCEPTION: main E Process: com.snapchat.android, PID: 17023 E java.lang.IllegalAccessError: Illegal class access: 'EdHooker58' attempting to access 'aqkl' (declaration of 'EdHooker58' appears in /data/user_de/0/com.snapchat.android/cache/edhookers/com.snapchat.android/Generated_1379810334.jar) E at EdHooker58.hook(Unknown Source:118) E at aqkk.a(SourceFile:142) E at aptj.a(SourceFile:1111) E at apsx.<init>(SourceFile:22) E at apsx.<init>(SourceFile:17) E at abiy.<init>(SourceFile:39) E at abiy.<init>(SourceFile:16) E at abiy$a.<clinit>(SourceFile:35) E at abiy$a.a(SourceFile:34) E at amus.<init>(SourceFile:1031) E at amcn.get(SourceFile:1348) E at azcj.get(SourceFile:47) E at ziq.a(SourceFile:50187) E at com.snapchat.android.SnapchatApplication.performDependencyInjection(SourceFile:587) E at com.snapchat.android.SnapchatApplication.onCreate(SourceFile:222) E at xdu.onCreate(SourceFile:39) E at com.facebook.buck.android.support.exopackage.ExopackageApplication.onCreate(SourceFile:136) E at android.app.Instrumentation.callApplicationOnCreate(Instrumentation.java:1154) E at android.app.ActivityThread.handleBindApplication(ActivityThread.java:5925) E at com.elderdrivers.riru.xposed.c.b.a.hook(Unknown Source:229) E at android.app.ActivityThread.access$1100(ActivityThread.java:201) E at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:1657) E at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:106) E at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:193) E at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:6723) E at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method) E at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:495) E at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:858) ActivityManager W Force finishing activity com.snapchat.android/.LandingPageActivity

bug.title: [BUG] Bootloop on LineageOS 15.1, Android 8.1
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 开机时停在 LineageOS 引导动画中，无法进入系统。 Stuck in LineageOS boot animation. Unable to boot into system. **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** N/A **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** Busybox for Android NDK ***1.29.3*** Ice Box System Plugin Module ***v1.6*** LogCat Bootloop ***v10*** Riru - Core ***v11*** (or ***v10***) And EdXposed. **系统型号、版本及xp版本/Versions** 尽量完整/Please write down fully Sony Xperia XZ1 Compact - [LineageOS 15.1](https://forum.xda-developers.com/xperia-xz1-compact/development/lineageoslilac-t3745215) - Android 8.1 - EdXposed 0.2.6 ~ 0.2.9.1 **相关Logcat/Logcat** 我进行了两次引导尝试，其中第二次引导尝试前，我在 TWRP 中清除了 Dalvik / Cache。以下是 LogCat Bootloop 模块为我获取的日志。似乎第一次引导时，EdXposed 并没有被加载。 I attempted to boot twice. Before the second time, I wiped Dalvik / Cache in TWRP. Here is the log got by LogCat Bootloop. It seems that in the first boot EdXposed is not loaded. First: https://gist.github.com/Menci/88c59cb31d479ce2bb373582ce02503a Second: https://gist.github.com/Menci/3c009c3649b9bc2b7bde34f379be6303

bug.title: [BUG] q++、音量增强模块无效（附部分模块的使用情况反馈）
bug.body: 什么情况/What happened? q++模块无效 音量增强无效 （已经尝试多次在xposed installer列表里面取消勾选->重新勾选->重启） Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List 顺便附上模块使用反馈： 1.上帝模式（一切正常） 2.微信增强（会导致微信偶发闪退） 3.微x模块（会导致微信频繁闪退） 4.qx模块（会导致qq偶发闪退） 5.q++（模块不生效） 6.音量增强0.0.27+网易云play版4.0.0-5.x（模块不生效） 7.xposed黑名单（一切正常） Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List 1.Universal GMS Doze 2.Wifi Bonding(Qualcomm) 3.busybox for Android ndk 4.magisk manger for recovery mode 5.mi8 stereo speaker mod 6.riru-core 7.riru-ed xposed 8.主题破解 9.miui去更新 10.miui去游戏加速排行 11.miui下载vip 12.小米8刘海对齐 系统型号、版本及xp版本/Versions 型号 - 系统 - 系统版本 - 安卓版本 - xp版本/Deivce 小米8 - MIUI10 - 8.8.6 - 8.1 - （0.2.8—0.2.9.1） 相关Logcat/Logcat 暂无

bug.title: EdXp + 幸运破解器模块 导致 Lawnchair V2 启动器持续崩溃
bug.body: 相关 Log: https://del.dog/vikebabugo 版本号： Android 9 ，版本号 PQ1A.190105.004 AospExtended 6.2 （第三方 ROM） Magisk 18.0 Riru Core v10 Ed Xposed 0.2.8.5 幸运破解器 8.1.4 Lawnchair V2 alpha-808

bug.title: [BUG] 2.8版本造成所有应用无法打开
bug.body: **什么情况/What happened?** 2.8版本安装后所有应用启动时闪退，2.3正常 **Xposed模块列表/Xposed Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **Magisk模块列表/Magisk Module List** 允许截图/Screenshot allowed **系统型号、版本及xp版本/Versions**
